property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever your opponent summons a creature or casts a spell, this turn, your opponent's creatures can't attack or block.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature wins a battle, you may untap it. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your opponent's creatures must block if able. ■ Whenever this creature wins a battle, untap it. ■ Each of your other Aliens in the battle zone gets +5000 power. {QUATTRO BREAKER} {LINK RELEASE} (When this creature leaves the battle zone, choose one of its psychic cells and return it to your hyperspatial zone and flip the rest of the cards.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put any number of nature Hunters from your mana zone into the battle zone tapped. {TRIPLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Your Hunters can't be blocked. ■ Whenever your Hunters lose a battle, they stay in the battle zone instead. ■ When this creature would be discarded from your hand by the effect of one of your opponent's spells or ability of acreature, you may put it into your mana zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Each of your other Aliens in the battle zone gets "speed attacker" and "slayer". ■ When this creature would be discarded from your hand by the effect of your opponent's spells or ability of a creature, you may put it into your mana zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. ■ If you have 2 shields or less, you may shieldify the top card of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may put a Aqua Attack or Aqua Cascade or both from among them into the battle zone. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may put a Aqua Attack or Aqua Cascade or both from among them into the battle zone. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose a creature and return it to its owner's hand. Then that player may put a creature from their hand that costs less than the chosen creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CASTLE} —Choose one of your shields and attach this card to fortify that shield. When that fortified shield leaves your shields, put this card into your graveyard. (Use "Shield Trigger" abilities before putting this card into your graveyard.) ■ Whenever one of your Aliens leaves the battle zone, you may put an Alien psychic creature that costs less than that Alien from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ■ If the fortified shield isn't fortified by any other castles, whenever the fortified shield would be broken by your opponent's creatures, you may return one of your other shields to your hand instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures. You may put a non-evolution creature that costs less than the destroyed creature from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all non-psychic creatures that have power 3000 or less. Then destroy all psychic creatures that have power 5000 or less. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CASTLE} —Choose one of your shields and attach this card to fortify that shield. When that fortified shield leaves your shields, put this card into your graveyard. (Use "Shield Trigger" abilities before putting this card into your graveyard.) ■ Each of your Hunters in the battle zone gets "speed attacker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CASTLE} —Choose one of your shields and attach this card to fortify that shield. When that fortified shield leaves your shields, put this card into your graveyard. (Use "Shield Trigger" abilities before putting this card into your graveyard.) ■ Each of your Hunters in the battle zone gets "speed attacker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ At the start of your turn, put the top card of your deck into your graveyard. If that card is a non-evolution Hunter, you may destroy this creature. If you do, put that Hunter into the battle zone. ■ This creature can't attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Look at the top 6 cards of your deck. You may put up to 3 cards from among them into your mana zone tapped and the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Discard a card. Then your opponent discards 2 cards from their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {MULTI SPACE CHARGE}: Light / Nature (Whenever you put a Light and/or Nature card into your mana zone, you may use this creature's Space Charge ability.) Light: Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it: {SPACE CHARGE}: Nature: One of your creatures in the battle zone gets +2000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {MULTI SPACE CHARGE}: Water / Darkness (Whenever you put a Water and/or Darkness card into your mana zone, you may use this creature's Space Charge ability.) Water: Draw a card: {SPACE CHARGE}: Darkness: Your opponent discards a card from their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {MULTI SPACE CHARGE}: Darkness / Fire (Whenever you put a Darkness and/or Fire card into your mana zone, you may use this creature's Space Charge ability.) Darkness: Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets -1000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.): {SPACE CHARGE}: Fire: Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 2000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {MULTI SPACE CHARGE}: Fire / Nature (Whenever you put a Fire and/or Nature card into your mana zone, you may use this creature's Space Charge ability.) Fire: This turn, one of your creatures in the battle zone gets "power attacker +3000": {SPACE CHARGE}: Nature: This turn, one of your creatures in the battle zone breaks an additional shield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Put a Darkness, Fire, or Nature psychic creature that costs 8 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ■ Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, if you have a Gil Fuji, Yokozuna in the battle zone, you may discard this card. If you do, stop the attack, that turn your Gil Fuji, Yokozuna gets +3000 power, and it battles with the attacking creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Put a Darkness, Fire, or Nature psychic creature that costs 8 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ■ Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, if you have a Gil Fuji, Yokozuna in the battle zone, you may discard this card. If you do, stop the attack, that turn your Gil Fuji, Yokozuna gets +3000 power, and it battles with the attacking creature.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Put a psychic creature that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ■ If you put a light psychic creature into the battle zone in this way, you may add a card in your hand to your shields face down. ■ If you put a water psychic creature into the battle zone in this way, this turn, your creatures can't be blocked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put a psychic creature that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ■ If you put a light psychic creature into the battle zone in this way, you may add a card from your hand to your shields face down. ■ If you put a nature psychic creature into the battle zone in this way, you may return a card from your mana zone to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Put a psychic creature that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ■ If you put a water psychic creature into the battle zone in this way, this turn, your creatures can't be blocked. ■ If you put a darkness psychic creature into the battle zone in this way, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. During your opponent's next turn, that creature must attack if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Put a psychic creature that costs5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ■ If you put a darkness psychic creature into the battle zone in this way, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. On your opponent's next turn, that creature must attack if able. ■ If you put a fire psychic creature into the battle zone in this way, one of your creatures in the battle zone can attack untapped creatures this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Put a psychic creature that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ■ If you put a fire psychic creature into the battle zone in this way, one of your creatures in the battle zone can attack untapped creatures this turn. ■ If you put a nature psychic creature into the battle zone in this way, you may return a card from your mana zone to your hand.

If you do, put a darkness psychic creature that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {MULTI SPACE CHARGE}: Light / Water (Whenever you put a Light and/or Water card into your mana zone, you may use this creature's Space Charge ability.) Light: Return a spell from your graveyard to your hand: {SPACE CHARGE}: Water: Return a shield from your shields to your hand. However, you can't use the "shield trigger" of that shield. Then add a card in your hand to your shields face down. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

Rules

If you do, put a darkness psychic creature that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)
